overview: GLEISDREIECK is a story about love, its different forms and the lies that are told in its name. In an austere audiovisual style, where the story unfolds supported by the performance of its three characters. Two very different departments located in opposite parts of Berlin, which Hedda visits to Petra and Zazie.
tagline: Hedda wanders around the city. Petra wants to see a movie. Zazie takes care of the orchids. The three of them like cherries.
title: Viral
